name: Crex Token
description:
The CREX token (CREX) is the native asset of the CREX24 exchange. It can be used for the following scenarios:

- Exchange for other crypto or fiat currency
- To get a discount when paying the cryptocurrency withdrawal fee
- Increased payout ratio (reduced margin) in provably fair games

CREX tokens can be obtained:

- As a reward for burning the remaining coins which cannot be sold on the exchange
- As compensation for burning non-liquid coins which are to be delisted
- Free of charge from the official Crex24 faucet
- By purchasing other crypto or fiat currency
